org.opentcs.util.math

Class ByteConversions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opentcs.util.math.ByteConversions

  • public final class ByteConversions
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides helper methods for conversions between various representations of numbers/data.

        Parameters:
        bytes - The byte array containing the word to be interpreted as a signed value. bytes[offset] will be used as the most significant byte, bytes[offset + 1] as the least significant byte.
        offset - The word's offset in the byte array.
        Returns:
        A short representing the given word when interpreted as a signed value.

      • intTo4PackedBCD

        public static byte[] intTo4PackedBCD(int value)
        Returns the packed BCD representation of the four least significant decimals of the given integer value as an array of (two) bytes. Fehlerhaft! 2010-02-05 H.Huber
        Parameters:
        value - The value for which to return the packed BCD representation.
        Returns:
        An array of two bytes containing the packed BCD representation of the four least significant decimals of the given integer value.
